columns.name: product_arn
columns.description: The ARN assigned to the product.

columns.name: activation_url
columns.description: The URL used to activate the product.

columns.name: company_name
columns.description: The name of the company that provides the product.

columns.name: marketplace_url
columns.description: The URL for the page that contains more information about the product.

columns.name: categories
columns.description: The categories assigned to the product.

columns.name: integration_types
columns.description: The types of integration that the product supports.

columns.name: product_subscription_resource_policy
columns.description: The resource policy associated with the product.
